meta.name: Wylde Pak
meta.description: Wylde Pak follows half-siblings Jack and Lily as they are pushed outside their comfort zones and learn to coexist while navigating new family dynamics, friends, and endless hijinks, all while helping run the family's pet grooming and boarding business. With guidance from their parents and grandmother, the two will learn about each other's previously separate lives, blended identity, vibrant culture, and the importance of family.

videos.title: Where There's a Will, There's a Way

Where There's a Will, There's a Way
Best Summer Ever?
videos.overview: When Lily and Jack must unexpectedly sacrifice their own summer plans, it kicks off a new, chaotic normal, starting with a runaway trailer that each insists on saving their own way.

videos.title: Sad, Single, and Stranded
videos.overview: Will & Min show Jack around to help him find a good story. Lily spills boba in Jack's suitcase and tries to hide the evidence.

videos.title: A Waste of a Perfect Summer Day
videos.overview: Jack tries to find the big picture as Lily shows him how to spend a perfect summer day in Canyon Valley.

videos.title: Woori World
videos.overview: The family prepares for war, AKA a trip to the local Asian market. After their battle to procure a rare cookie, Jack feels more part of the family

videos.title: Finding FlamingoFan85
videos.overview: The Groom & Board gets a bad review. Lily tries to find the culprit and corr.

videos.title: Just a Little Pipe Problem
videos.overview: The Groom & Board gets a surprise inspection, but the broken pipe Jack and Lil neglected to fix might ruin them all.

videos.title: Camp Chuck
videos.overview: Chuck's got a new hustle: theatre camp! Jack and Lily are sure it's a scam, but there's more to the chaotic show than they realized.

videos.title: The Three Ravens
videos.overview: Ellie and the kids investigate cryptic Mrs. Withers, but when Jack goes missing in her creepy home, Ellie and Lil must save him.

videos.title: Left Holding the Bag
videos.overview: Eager to become master criminals, Lil and Jack help Chuck with his dirty laundry, but are they ready for a life of crime?

videos.title: The Meatball of Canyon Valley
videos.overview: When Halmoni chooses Jack over Lil to be her Trot dance competition partner, jealous Lil seeks revenge.

videos.title: Sticky Fingers
videos.overview: Min asks Jack to run a simple errand, but Charlie the gibbon intervenes, sending Jack and Lil chasing after him.

videos.title: Warriors Against the Realm
videos.overview: Lily introduces Jack to her favorite video game, but when he keeps losing, Jack binges the game and turns into a toxic troll.

videos.title: Sungandeul
videos.overview: Slice of life vignettes that illustrate the modern-day family dynamic.

videos.title: The Boba-Get
videos.overview: Lil's favorite boba shop is closing! The kids try to save the caf√© using pucker limes, but are quickly forced to save Canyon Valley from the pucker.

videos.title: Be Your Own Bean
videos.overview: Lil and Min both realize how similar they are to their moms.

videos.title: Meats of Strength
videos.overview: Beef invites Jack to a sleepover, but Jack, a sleepover newbie, freaks out over impressing his friend.

videos.title: Dead Ed's
videos.overview: Jack and Lily try to prove they're the one true local, enduring a series of bizarre quests in the local dive.

videos.title: The Secret of Lake Island
videos.overview: Lily introduces Jack to the deserted Lake Island theme park. When they get stranded, their new friendship quickly crumbles.

videos.title: Father, Son, and Furniture Store
videos.overview: Will tries to connect with Jack at the oddball store Mike A's, but everything goes awry and they must fight.

videos.title: LAD
videos.overview: Lily and her BFFs Anusha and Debs fight to win the coveted trophy at Hank n Beans arcade.

videos.title: Before 10am
videos.overview: Determined to learn the truth about Jack's secret morning life, Lily does the unthinkable and wakes up early but her sleuthing gets them both in big trouble.

videos.title: Mrs. Withers' Parables
videos.overview: In an anthology of Halloween stories told by Mrs. Withers, Min encounters a terrifying doppelganger, Will fends off a Toastpocalypse, Jack and Lily bury the wrong pet, and the kids get sucked into a video game.

videos.title: Where There's a Will, There's a Way
